name: Desktop Car
description:
Controls:

Make sure to click on the car to give it "focus". If you don't do this, your inputs will not work.

  • W to accelerate
  • A+D to turn
  • S to brake
  • Right click to return the car to its staring position
  • Q to close the application

And now you can enjoy drifting this car around your desktop! (And maybe waste a little time too.)
